Dialogue: Myth. You need to see the truth.

Speaker: bella

Dialogue: Are you afraid?

Dialogue: No.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Hold on.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Are you afraid! ?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: No!

Dialogue: Edward? Where are you?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: You're... beautiful.. .

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: I don't believe that.

Dialogue: Because you believe the lie. The camouflage. I'm the world's most dangerous predator. Everything about me invites you in - my voice, my face, even my smell. As if I need any of that.. .

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: As if you could outrun me. As if you could fight me off.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: I'm designed to kill.

Dialogue: You... took me by surprise.  I don't know how to... do this.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Me, and my family, we're different from others of our kind. We're not nomadic, we have a permanent home. We only hunt animals. We've learned to control our thirst.. .

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Oh... I thought you hated me when we met.

Dialogue: I did. For making me want you so badly. I'm still not sure I can control myself.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: I know you can.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: I wish I could understand this thing you see in me. You look at me with those eyes.. .

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: I'm afraid.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Good.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Not of that. I'm afraid... you'll disappear. That I'll lose you.

Dialogue: Be very still.

Dialogue: Stupid lamb.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Sick masochistic lion.

Dialogue: Where'd he find you?

Dialogue: In a hospital, dying of Spanish influenza. My parents had already died.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Not just. Our bite contains venom. And once we taste blood, a sort of.. . frenzy begins. It's almost impossible to stop.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: First with me, then with his wife, Esme. He found her in a hospital, as well. The others followed.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: ... No, that's just Carlisle. He would never do... this, to someone who had another choice.

Dialogue: So Carlisle's the reason why you hunt animals, instead of people.

Dialogue: Not the only reason.

Dialogue: We call ourselves vegetarians, by the way... For our kind, hunting animals is like living on tofu. It keeps you strong but isn't very satisfying.

Dialogue: Show off.

Dialogue: It's not that impressive, really. Anyone in my family can do this.

Dialogue: Can they all read minds, too?

Dialogue: Her visions are very subjective. The future can change.

Dialogue: Come to my house tomorrow.

Speaker: jacob
Dialogue: Looks good. You got that dent out.

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: Actually, we came to visit your flat screen. First Mariners game of the season. Plus Jacob here kept bugging me to see you again.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: Pale Ale.

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: Harry Clearwater's homemade fish fry.

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: Any luck with the Waylon case?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: A person did that?

Speaker: jacob
Dialogue: A crazy person, walking around barefoot this time of year.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: Spread the word out at the rez, will ya? Keep the kids out of the woods.

Speaker: billy
Dialogue: Will do.  Don't want no one else getting hurt.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: It's... wonderful. EDWARD You expected turrets, dungeons and moats? BELLA No... not moats. He takes her hand. She girds herself. They head inside.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Thanks to tinted windows... It's the one place we never have to hide.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Bon giorno?

Speaker: esme
Dialogue: Molto bene!

Speaker: esme
Dialogue: I hope you're hungry.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Oh, absolutely -

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: She already ate.

Speaker: rosalie
Dialogue: Perfect.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: I just assumed -- because you don't eat, you know.. .

Speaker: esme
Dialogue: Of course. That was very considerate of you.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Ignore her. I do.

Speaker: rosalie
Dialogue: Yes, let's keep pretending this isn't dangerous for all of us.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: I would never, ever tell anyone.

Speaker: emmett
Dialogue: The problem is, you two have gone public now, so.. .

Speaker: rosalie
Dialogue: No, she should know.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: ... Badly?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: And you're Jasper, right?

Speaker: jasper
Dialogue: Pleasure to meet you.

Speaker: alice
Dialogue: You won't hurt her, Jasper.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: I'll give you a tour of the house.

Speaker: alice
Dialogue: I'll see you soon.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Graduation caps?

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: A private joke. We matriculate a lot.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: What a nightmare, repeating high school.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: ... and this is my room.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: So you're obsessed with music. But.. .  No bed?

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: No sleep.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Ever?

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: No nightmares, no drool, no snoring.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Do you have any favorites?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Depends. Alternative? Jazz? Sixties, seventies.. .

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Ooh, she knows her music. Alright, nineties. Eighteen-nineties. Classical.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: I'd have to say... Debussy.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: My favorite, too.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: No dancing.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Ever?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: No tripping, no falling, no derision.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: I can always make you.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: You don't scare me.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: You really shouldn't have said that.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Don't you dare -

Speaker: esme
Dialogue: She's brought him to life.

Speaker: esme
Dialogue: Alice has been wrong before.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Trust me?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: In theory.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Then close your eyes.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Open.

Speaker: eric
Dialogue: Gambling, tuxedos and - -  Bond. James -- ow!

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: Guys, we got something -

Speaker: victoria
Dialogue: They took the bait.

Speaker: james
Dialogue: By tomorrow they'll be half way to Winnipeg.

Speaker: mike
Dialogue: Yo, Arizona. So. You and Cullen.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Sorry I'm late. Biology project.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: Ordered you the seafood combo.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Order one for yourself next time. You should cut back on the steak.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: I'm healthy as a horse.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: The suspect's moving east. Kitsap County Sheriff is taking over from here. They're putting extra guys on.

Speaker: cora
Dialogue: Hope they catch him fast.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: Your friends are flagging you.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: It's okay you wanna join them. I'm just gonna turn in early anyway.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Yeah, me, too.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: It's a Friday night. Go out. The Newton boy's got a big smile for you. Nice family, the Newtons.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: He's just a friend.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: None of the boys in town interest you?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: We're not really going to talk about boys, are we?

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: Just... you should be around people. I leave you alone too much.

Speaker: cora
Dialogue: Berry cobbler, two forks.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: So spring training's going well?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Actually, Forks is kind of growing on me.

Speaker: rene
Dialogue: (stops, knows there's

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Maybe.. .

Speaker: rene
Dialogue: Tell me everything! Jock? Indie? Bet he's smart. Is he smart?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Well... he is kind of a history buff.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: I, uh... have to go.

Speaker: rene
Dialogue: No way, we gotta talk boys. Are you being safe?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: I'll call you later, Mom.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: How did you get in here?

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: The window. As always.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: You've been here before?

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: What else is there to do at night?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: You're a peeping Tom! Perv!

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Shh! The Chief will hear you!

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: I just... like watching over you.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: There's something I'd like to try.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Oh... I'm... oh.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: I'm stronger than I thought.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Wish I could say the same. I'm so embarrassed.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Don't be. But we have to be careful.  I can never lose control with you. Ever.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: He's too old for you.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: We're both juniors. I thought you liked the Cullens.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: And I thought you weren't interested in any of the boys in town.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Edward doesn't live in town. And it's in the early stage and - - whatever, he's outside right now.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: Now? He's out there?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: He wants to meet you. Officially.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: Good.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Be nice, okay? He's... important.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Chief Swan. I wanted to formally introduce myself. I'm Edward.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: I won't keep Bella out late tonight. We're just going to go play baseball with my family.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: Bella's going to play baseball?

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: Well. More power to you, I guess.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: She'll be safe with me, sir, I promise.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: You got that pepper spray?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: No fair, reading Charlie's mind.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: And since when do vampires like baseball?

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: It's the American pastime. Plus, there's a thunderstorm coming. It's the only time we can play. You'll see why.

Speaker: esme
Dialogue: Good thing you're here. We need a umpire.

Speaker: emmett
Dialogue: She thinks we cheat.

Speaker: alice
Dialogue: It's time.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Now I get why you need the thunder.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: That has to be a home run.

Speaker: esme
Dialogue: Edward's very fast.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Yer out?

Speaker: alice
Dialogue: Stop! I didn't see them.. .

Speaker: alice
Dialogue: They're traveling so quickly -

Speaker: alice
Dialogue: They did, but then they heard us.. .  And changed their minds.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Put your hair down -

Speaker: rosalie
Dialogue: Like that'll help. I could smell her from across the field.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: I shouldn't have brought you here. I'm so sorry.

Speaker: laurent
Dialogue: I believe this belongs to you.

Speaker: laurent
Dialogue: Could you use three more players?

Speaker: laurent
Dialogue: I'm Laurent. This is Victoria. And James.

Speaker: laurent
Dialogue: Our apologies. We didn't realize the territory had been claimed.

Speaker: laurent
Dialogue: Really? Well, we won't be a problem any more.

Speaker: victoria
Dialogue: The humans were tracking us, but we led them East-

Speaker: james
Dialogue: You brought a snack.

Speaker: emmett
Dialogue: Just try it.

Speaker: laurent
Dialogue: Yes, I can see the game is over. We'll go now. James?

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: James is a tracker. I saw his mind. The hunt is his obsession, and my reaction set him off - -

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: -- We're a large clan of strong fighters all protecting one vulnerable human.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: The first place he'll go is your house. He'll track your scent there.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: I said, leave me alone!

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Bella, don't do this. Just think about it, please -

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Get out! It's over.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: Bella? What happened?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: I have to get out of this place. Out of Forks. I'm leaving. Now.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: No, Dad.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: Then what? Did he break up with you?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: I broke up with him.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: I thought you liked him?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: That's why I have to leave. I don't want this. I want to go home.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: I'll be in the truck.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: Your mother's not even in Phoenix.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: She'll come home. I'll call her from the road.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: You can't drive home now. I'll take you to the airport in the morning.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: I want to drive. I need time to think. I'll pull into a motel in a few hours. I promise.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: Bella... I just got you back.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: His face... I said the same words my mother used when she left him.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: It was the only way he'd let you go.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Your father's safe now, Bella. The tracker is following us -

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: It's alright. It's just Emmett. Alice is in the car behind us.

Speaker: laurent
Dialogue: I've grown tired of his games. But he's got unparalleled senses. Absolutely lethal. I've never seen anything like him in three hundred years ... And the woman, Victoria, will back him. Don't underestimate her.

Speaker: laurent
Dialogue: I'm truly sorry for what's been unleashed here.

Speaker: jasper
Dialogue: I've had to fight our kind before. We're hard to kill.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: But not impossible. We'll tear him up

Speaker: rosalie
Dialogue: If he doesn't get to one of us first.

Speaker: rosalie
Dialogue: Too late.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: I'll run Bella south, while you lead the tracker away -

Speaker: alice
Dialogue: I'll go with Bella. Jasper and I will drive her south.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Can you keep your thoughts to yourself?

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Esme, Rosalie, put these on so the tracker will pick up Bella's scent.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: If any of you get hurt because of me -

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: We won't, there are five of us, two of them. When it's done, I'll come get you.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: You're my life now.

Speaker: alice
Dialogue: You should eat.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: They could get hurt. It's not worth it.

Speaker: jasper
Dialogue: Yes. It is.

Speaker: jasper
Dialogue: Edward's changed since he found you. And none of us want to look into his eyes for the next hundred years if he loses you.

Speaker: jasper
Dialogue: What do you see?

Speaker: alice
Dialogue: The tracker. He just changed course.. .

Speaker: alice
Dialogue: Mirrors. It's a room of mirrors.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: How do the visions work? Edward said they weren't always certain.

Speaker: jasper
Dialogue: She sees the course people are on, while they're on it. If they change their minds, the visions change.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: So the course James is on now will lead him to... a ballet studio?

Speaker: alice
Dialogue: You've been here?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: No. I don't know. I used to take ballet lessons as a kid. The school had an arch like that.

Speaker: jasper
Dialogue: Was your school here in Phoenix?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Yeah, around the corner from my house. But I haven't been there in ten years.

Speaker: jasper
Dialogue: Do you have any reason to go now?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: No. Hell, no. I hated the place.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: I'm coming to get you. (hates having to say

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Bella, we're in too deep. We can't change how we feel.. .

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: No... we can't.  When will you get here?

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: In a couple hours. Then you and I will go somewhere. Together. The others will keep hunting.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Mom, I'm so glad you got my - -

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Calm down, Mom. Everything is fine, okay? I'll explain every -

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: ... Mom? Are you there?

Speaker: james
Dialogue: I was prepared to wait for you. But then Mom came home after she received a very worried call from your Dad. It all worked out quite well.

Speaker: james
Dialogue: I must say, Forks High School doesn't protect its students' privacy very well. It was just too easy for Victoria to find your previous address.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Leave my mother out of this.

Speaker: james
Dialogue: You're protective of her. That's nice. You can still save her. But you'll need to get away from your friends. Can you do that?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: I... don't think so.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Where should I meet you?

Speaker: james
Dialogue: The old ballet studio around the corner. And I'll know if you bring anyone along. Poor mommy would pay the price for that mistake.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: 8th and Palo Verde, please.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Everyone makes fun of me.

Speaker: rene
Dialogue: But you're a wonderful dancer.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Mom, I suck.

Speaker: james
Dialogue: That's my favorite part. Stubborn child, weren't you?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: She's not here.

Speaker: james
Dialogue: Sorry. But you really made it too easy.

Speaker: james
Dialogue: So to make things more entertaining, I'm going to make a little film of our time together. Borrowed this from your house. Hope you don't mind.

Speaker: james
Dialogue: Excellent! An escape attempt.

Speaker: james
Dialogue: It'll break Edward's little heart.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Edward has nothing to do with this.

Speaker: james
Dialogue: Beautiful! Very visually dynamic. I chose my stage well.

Speaker: james
Dialogue: Still stubborn, aren't you? Is that what makes you special? Because frankly, I don't see it.

Speaker: james
Dialogue: Too bad he didn't have the strength to turn you. Instead, he kept you this fragile little human. It's cruel, really.

Speaker: james
Dialogue: Well done! You've succeeded in annoying me.

Speaker: james
Dialogue: Tell Edward how much it hurts.

Speaker: james
Dialogue: Tell him to avenge you.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: No! Edward, don't.. .

Speaker: james
Dialogue: Cut! The end.

Speaker: james
Dialogue: You're alone... because you're faster than the others. But not stronger.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: I'm strong enough to kill you.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: It's on fire! My hand!

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Venom - -

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: No!

Speaker: alice
Dialogue: It's going to happen. I've seen it -

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: It doesn't have to be that way.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: It's burning!

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: What's the other choice? You said -

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: I -- won't be able to stop -

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: It's alright, Bella. I'll make it go away.

Speaker: rene
Dialogue: He never leaves. And your dad's down in the cafeteria.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: What... happened?

Speaker: rene
Dialogue: Baby, you fell down two flights of stairs and through a window.

Speaker: rene
Dialogue: It's Phil. He's worried about you.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Mom, you're... texting.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: That's great mom.

Speaker: rene
Dialogue: Jacksonville is always sunny and you'll have your own bathroom.. .

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Mom, wait. I want to live in Forks. I have Dad.. .

Speaker: rene
Dialogue: And he's there.

Speaker: rene
Dialogue: Charlie doesn't like him. Blames him for your leaving.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: What do you think?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Um, Mom, would you mind getting Dad? I want to talk to him. Apologize.

Speaker: rene
Dialogue: I'm sure he doesn't care about that, Baby. But Ill go get him.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Is James - did you -- ?

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: We took care of him. And the woman, Victoria, she ran off.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: I'm alive because of you.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: You're in here because of me.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: The worst of it... was thinking I couldn't stop -

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: But you did.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Bella, you should go to Jacksonville. Where I can't hurt you anymore.. .

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: What? No! I want to be with you! I don't want -

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: Heard that before.

Speaker: charlie
Dialogue: ... and... you look beautiful.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Prom is an important rite of passage. I don't want you to miss anything.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Shall we?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: You're serious.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: See? You're dancing.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: At prom.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: I want you. Always.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: I won't end your life for you.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: I'm dying anyway. Every minute, I get closer, older

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: That's how it's supposed to happen.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Not the way Alice saw it.  I heard her. She saw me like you.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Her visions change, Bella.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Based on what someone decides. And I've decided.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: Is that what you dream about? Becoming a monster?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: I dream about being with you forever.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: You really want this?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Yes.

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: Yes.

Speaker: edward
Dialogue: You're going to have a long and happy life with me. Isn't that enough?

Speaker: bella
Dialogue: For now.
